namuth eeka kale naha.  2019 di me warshaya sandaha athuru sammatha ginumak idiripath karanna ma wisin thiranaya kale janadhipathiwaranayen pasu pathwana nawa janadhipathiwarayata swakiya nawa prathipaththi anuwa warshika ayawayak sampadanaya kirimata ida prasthawa labadimatayi.  aluthin path wu rajayata thama sahana malla da athulath nawa ayawayak idiripath kirimata aprel 30 dakwa kalaya laba di thibenawa.  2019 nowambar 17 wenida sita 2020 aprel 30 dakwa kisidu badhawakin thorawa mema rajayata aluth ayawayak idiripath kirimata puluwana.  ese nokara mema rajaya parlimenthuwa kal damamin 69 lakshayak janathawa apeksha kala sahana malla da janathawata ahimi kara atha.  wipaksha nayaka garu sajith premadasa mahatha saha apa pakshaye nayaka garu ranil wikramasinha mahatha da mathiwarana kalaye oba janathawata labadun porondu itu kirimata awashya sahaya labadena bawa da wiwidha awasthawala prakasha kala.  ee wagema dinapatha ihala yana sahal, elawalu mila adukara ganimata, jiwana wiyadama pahatha helimata, rata pura athiwemin yana polim yugaya awasan kara ganimata awashya oonama sahayak me parlimenthuwedi labadimata eksath jathika pakshaya sudanam.  2020 warshaya sandaha ayawayak pena thek manayakawath naha.

oba 80 – 90 dashakayanhi nawa yowun wiya gewuyek nam aparadhakaruwanta kisidu samawak nodun kotasak miniseku kotasak robowaku wu polis niladhariyeku wata gethunu robokop wikramanwitha chithrapata malawath rupawahini katun malawath obage mathakaye athuwata saka natha.nuduru anagathaya pasubim karagath mema katha malawa aarambhayedi maranasannawa thuwala labana polis niladhariyage diwi bera ganimata waidyawarunta haki wanne ohuge siruren kotasak robo sirurak ha baddhakara robokop nirmanaya kirimen pamani.palamu robokop chithrapataya 1987 wasaredi thiragatha wu athara dewana ha thewana chithrapata piliwelin 1990 ha 1993 wasara waladi thiragatha kerini.1994 wasaredi prathama robokop rupawahini katha malawada wikashaya wu athara obath mamath narambau merata wikashanaya wu robokop katun wadasatahanada 1980 wasare nirmanaya wuwaki.dashaka dekakata aasanna kalayak nidragathawa siti me robo minisa swakiya upan bima wu amerika eksath janapadaya menma shri lankawedi da yali pana ganwenne 87 wasaredi thiragatha wu palamu robo kop sinama nirmanaye prathinirmanayak lesini.athiwishala piriwayak (amerikanu dolar miliyana 130k : rupiyal koti 1700k) daramin nirmanaya kerunu nawa robo kop chithrapataya winadi 117ka kalayak mululle 3ch thakshanayen pulul thiraye digaharena mema sinama nirmanaya wallawaththa sawoyi 3ch sinama shalawedi dan obatath narambaime awasthawa udawi atha.prathama robokop chithrapataye sema nuduru anagathaya (2028) pasubim karagath mema nawa chithrapatayeda wikramanwitha kathawak athulath we.
